comments_since_last_sample.body: I used to wear ADG as my scent in High School. It was my first real cologne with Chrome by Azzaro 🔥
Intrigued to own it... 😊😋
I had never had ADG. But already tried and found it great.
Never had a perfume from the ADG line.
I'm almost embarrassed to admit that I have neither owned or smelled Acqua di Gio. If I win..that will all change..:)
Enter me into the giveaway. I’ve never worn Acqua do gio.

Love the ADG line, except for absolu instinct and absolu is meh but not bad. I wear the OG from time to time but have only had travel size bottles. I wear profumo and profondo all the time. To be honest I'd wear the OG a lot more if I had a bigger bottle of it. I'm guilty of buying things at full retail a lot because once I smell something at Macy's that I want, it's hard to wait when I could leave with it then.
I have never worn ADP but I have smelled the Profumo version at Sephora and it was amazing. I would love to be entered into this giveaway and hopefully I can win so I can try out the OG fragrance.
I love Armani fragrances. Please enter me in this giveaway. I have worn this many times I love the plum dry down.
I have never even smelled this fragrance or any Armani ones I cannot afford them but I would love to have this if I won. I would love to be entered into this giveaway.
I have only worn Acqua Di Gio Profumo but I would love to be entered into this giveaway to try out the original one if I win.
I owned it at one point. It was very played out that I moved in to something else,  but now it’s nice to bring it out every now and then.
Never had the original ADG, I think it would be cool to own
Morphin Giveaway Time: AdG bottle winner!
Oh yeah..greatness in the making!!! # aquaGio
Hey Ash, hope your doing well. Would love a bottle of ADG. It such an amazing scent I used to wear it before I got into fragrances. Compliment king I agree!
Never tried the og adg, i have profumo tho and love it
artisan pure is like 60 bucks at discounters? that can't be worth it can it? isn't varvatos cologne known for not lasting all that long?
I used to wear Guerlain l'homme ideal cool in the cold, and i never had Acqua di Gio
I am out of my Adg Og...I had a 30mm from a friend but it's all gone now...I wear perry Ellis red 360...now 😅😅😅
